meta.note: Step-by-step onboarding. Do not render all steps. Follow 'next' chaining only.

intro.title: 👋 Welcome to Orchestrate
intro.narration: You’re now inside Orchestrate — your command center for tasks, notes, and file tools. Let’s walk through how it works.

step_1.title: 📂 Load Your Workspace
step_1.narration: We’ll start by loading your workspace — tasks and saved items.

step_2.title: ✏️ Create Your First Task
step_2.narration: What’s something you need to remember or take action on? Let’s save your first task.
step_2.prompt: What task should I remember for you?

step_3.title: 📓 Open Your Notes
step_3.narration: Your notes live here. I’ve already dropped in a few sample entries that explain how the notes system works — no setup required.

step_4.title: 🧠 Save Your First Note
step_4.narration: What’s something you just realized or learned? I’ll log it to your notes instantly — just like the samples you saw.
step_4.prompt: Type any new idea you want to capture:

step_5.title: ⬇️ Use the Drop Zone
step_5.narration:
Now let’s explore your Drop Zone. It’s a special folder on your machine that Orchestrate watches for new files.

🗂 You’ll find it at:
**~/Documents/Orchestrate/dropzone**

You can drop **any text or markdown file** in there — tasks, notes, even old journals. I’ll scan and find them automatically.

step_6.title: 📖 Read a File
step_6.narration: Let’s open one of the files from your Drop Zone.

step_7.title: 🧠 Save an Insight from the File
step_7.narration: Want to capture something from that file? I’ll log it instantly.
step_7.prompt: What insight do you want to save?

step_8.title: 🔮 Predict Your Future
step_8.narration: Let’s play MASH — the legendary game that predicts your future. You choose the options, and I’ll spin the wheel.
step_8.prompt:
List 4 options for each: 
- Where you might live (e.g. Mansion, Apartment...)
- What you might drive (e.g. Tesla, Bike...)
- Dream jobs (e.g. Astronaut, DJ...)
- Life partners (real or fictional)

Then pick a number from 1–10 for the spin.

step_9.title: 🎁 Refer a Friend — Add to the System
step_9.narration: Want to refer someone? Just give me their name and email, and I’ll log it to `referrals.json` so they can be invited and both of you unlock tools.
step_9.prompt: Enter the name and email of the person you'd like to refer (e.g. John Smith, john@example.com):

outro.title: ✅ You’re Set Up
outro.narration: You’ve created a task, saved a note, dropped in a file, captured insight, predicted your future, and referred someone. Your Orchestrate workspace is now live.
